resources.string:
This Screen Shows the List of Artist's wise songs in memory card we can retrive this list from internal storage or SD Card by scanning the file extension
 Ex: .mp3 Extension
 and suing the information provided by the music api 

Currently playing music in the bottom of the screen which increases user experience

This Screen Shows the List fo Favorite Songs Wise List we can save the favorite list of songs in a app dedicated sqlite/realm database and retrieve according to the user action
Using a Different View such as 
1.ListView
2.RecyclerView 
 and using Cursor Adpater in case of SQLite Database or Realm in built Queries in case app uses Realm Database 
Currently playing music in the bottom of the screen which increases user experience

This Welcome Screen or Home Screen Contains Navigational to three different screens which are 1.Artist Playlist 
2.Album Playlist
3.Favourite Playlist

On Pressing the top logo icon on any screen it will bring to homescreen that is the present screen.
 Bottom of the Layout Show the last/current paying music and contorl to shuffle the music play stream.
This Screen Show the Presently playing song deatils and has controls like stop,play,playing back song,front song
This Screen Shows the List fo Albums and Currently playing music in the bottom of the screen which increases user experience
